message.body: So my back gave out again yesterday while driving. I can barely move now and couldn't just really sleep. can you tell Dave that I can't move? I will com
e in sat and make up the time. I don't have sick days for this so it is just going to screw up my schedule. I xl make it up to you and work ten hours tom
Uh...you don't have to make it up to me. I'll tell Dave. Hope you feel better.
